trans-unit.source: Provides a secure and reliable binding that is optimized for on-machine communication.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en sikker og pålitelig binding som er optimalisert for kommunikasjon for datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: The NetNamedPipeBinding generates a run-time communication stack by default, which uses transport security, named pipes for message delivery, and a binary message encoding.
trans-unit.target: NetNamedPipeBinding genererer en kjøretid for kommunikasjonsstakk som standard som bruker navngitte datakanaler for meldingslevering og en binære meldingskoding transportsikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: This binding is an appropriate [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] system-provided choice for on-machine communication.
trans-unit.target: Denne bindingen er riktig [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] angitt system valget for kommunikasjon for datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: It also supports transactions.
trans-unit.target: Den støtter også transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: The default configuration for the NetNamedPipeBinding is similar to the configuration provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding>, but it is simpler because the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] implementation is only meant for on-machine use and consequently there are fewer exposed features.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonfigurasjonen for NetNamedPipeBinding ligner konfigurasjonen som er angitt av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding>, men det er enklere fordi den [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] implementering er bare ment for bruk for maskin, og derfor det er færre eksponerte funksjoner.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The most notable difference is that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> setting only offers the <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> options.
trans-unit.target: Mest synlig forskjellen er at den <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>innstillingen bare tilbud av <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>Alternativer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: SOAP security support is not an included option.
trans-unit.target: Støtte for SOAP er ikke inkludert alternativ.

trans-unit.source: The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode%29> the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhet virkemåten kan konfigureres ved hjelp av den valgfrie `securityMode` parameter i <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode%29>konstruktøren.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default security mode used is <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: Standard sikkerhetsmodusen brukes er <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding"></xref> class with a specified security mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding"> </xref> klassen med en angitt sikkerhetsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you want to configure the security explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren når du vil konfigurere sikkerheten eksplisitt.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode> when using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>ved Standardkonstruktøren.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"></xref> value that specifies whether Windows security is used with named pipes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"> </xref> verdi som angir om Windows-sikkerhet brukes med navngitte datakanaler.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding"></xref> class with a specified configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding"> </xref> klassen med angitt navn.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you want to initialize the binding settings from configuration.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren når du vil starte innstillingene for binding fra konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the [netNamedPipeBinding Element](../Topic/%3CnetNamedPipeBinding%3E.md).
trans-unit.target: Navnet på bindingen konfigurasjonen for den [netNamedPipeBinding elementet](../Topic/%3CnetNamedPipeBinding%3E.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en samling med bindingen-elementer for bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> that makes up the binding.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>som utgjør bindingen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of SOAP that is used for messages processed by this binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter versjonen av SOAP som brukes for meldinger som er behandlet av denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: SOAP 1.2 must be used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.2 må brukes med denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap12*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap12*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap12*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det angitte vertsnavnet brukes til å nå tjenesten når samsvarende URIEN.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*> value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*>verdi som angir om det angitte vertsnavnet brukes til å nå tjenesten når samsvarende URIEN.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode"></xref>, which ignores the hostname in the match.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode"> </xref>, som ignorerer vertsnavnet i samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt antall byte som brukes til å buffer innkommende meldinger i minnet.

trans-unit.source: If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får mer data enn du kan buffer, forblir dataene som overskrider bufferstørrelsen underliggende socket til din buffer har plass til resten av dataene.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som brukes til å buffer innkommende meldinger i minnet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 524,288 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 524 288 byte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt antall byte som brukes til buffer innkommende meldinger i minnet.

trans-unit.source: If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får mer data enn du kan buffer, forblir dataene som overskrider bufferstørrelsen underliggende socket til din buffer har plass til resten av dataene.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som brukes til å buffer innkommende meldinger i minnet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 65,536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 65 536 byte.

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections, both inbound and outbound, that are allowed to endpoints configured with the named pipe binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt antall tilkoblinger, både innkommende og utgående, som kan endepunkt som er konfigurert med bindingen for navngitte datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of inbound and the maximum number of outbound connections are set to the same value.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall innkommende og utgående tilkoblinger maksimalt antall er satt til samme verdi.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of named pipe connections that are allowed with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall tilkoblinger som er tillatt med denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 10.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a received message that is processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale størrelsen, i byte for en mottatt melding som behandles av bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size (in bytes) for a received message that is processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Maksimal størrelse (i byte) for en mottatt melding som behandles av bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 65,536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 65 536 byte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir begrensninger i kompleksiteten i SOAP-meldinger som kan behandles av endepunkt som er konfigurert med denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.
trans-unit.target: Begrensninger for kompleksitet beskytte mot en klasse med tjenestenektangrep (DOS) som prøver å bruke meldingen kompleksitet til å binde både endpoint behandlingsressurser.

trans-unit.source: The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A> = 32 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> = 8192 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> = 16384 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> = 4096 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> = 16384
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som express disse betingelsene og standardverdiene er som følger:- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A>= 32 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A>= 8192 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A>= 16384 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A>= 4096 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A>= 16384</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas> that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas>som angir kompleksitet begrensninger i SOAP-meldinger som utveksles.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas>

trans-unit.source: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdier for disse betingelsene er angitt i delen nedenfor kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: The value set is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI transport scheme for the channels and listeners that are configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter transport URI-skjemaet for kanaler og lyttere som er konfigurert med denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Returns "net.pipe".
trans-unit.target: Returnerer "net.pipe".

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that specifies the type of security used with services configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som angir hvilken type sikkerheten som brukes med services som er konfigurert med denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity> provides the types of security and settings available to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity>Gir typer sikkerhet og innstillinger som er tilgjengelige for <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity"></xref> that is used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity"> </xref> som brukes med denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxConnections*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxConnections*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxConnections*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxConnections*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxConnections*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxConnections*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.ReaderQuotas*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.ReaderQuotas*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.ReaderQuotas*>

trans-unit.source: This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Dette brukes av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integrering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.ReaderQuotas*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.ReaderQuotas*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.ReaderQuotas*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Security*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Security*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Security*>

trans-unit.source: This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Dette brukes av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integrering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Security*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Security*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Security*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.TransactionProtocol*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.TransactionProtocol*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.TransactionProtocol*>

trans-unit.source: This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Dette brukes av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integrering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.TransactionProtocol*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.TransactionProtocol*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.TransactionProtocol*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om innkommende forespørsler håndteres synkron eller asynkron.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the incoming requests are handled asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>for å angi at innkommende forespørsler behandles asynkront.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether transactions should be flowed to the service.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om transaksjoner skal flytes til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The TransactionFlow property enables you to specify whether this binding should support flowing transactions.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TransactionFlow kan du angi om denne bindingen skal støtter følgende transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client’s transactions should be flowed to the service; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis klientens transaksjoner skal flytes til tjenesten. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transactions protocol used by the service to flow transactions.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Transaksjonsprotokollen som brukes av tjenesten flyten transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: The WS-Atomic Transaction protocol can also be used by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Protokollen WS Atomic transaksjonen kan også brukes ved å angi den <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004%2A>verdi.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> used by the service to flow transactions.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"> </xref> brukes av tjenesten flyten transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: The default protocol is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardprotokollen er <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed (in one or both directions) or buffered modes of message transfer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tjenesten konfigurert med bindingen bruker direkteavspilte (i en eller begge retninger) eller bufret modus for meldingsoverføringen.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to stream only the incoming or the outgoing messages by specifying, respectively, <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å flyten bare innkommende eller utgående meldinger ved å angi, henholdsvis <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode> value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed (in one or both directions) or buffered modes of message transfer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>verdi som angir om tjenesten som er konfigurert med bindingen bruker direkteavspilte (i en eller begge retninger) eller bufret modus for meldingsoverføringen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>
